Html:
Hi there,

I was wondering if there is a way to bind the "DisplayName" property of "Links" and "LinkGroups" to a DynamicResource?
Why? Because I want to implement a localisation into my application. It works fine for the content of pages and usercontrols, but the menu is not updated whatever I try.
So far I derived "Displayable" from DependendyObject but now I am struggling with the question, how to update the "MenuLinkGroupProperty" in "ModernMenu". Or maybe in "ModernWindow"?
I would really appreciate every single one of your ideas.
I am still new to C#, WPF and ModernUI and my english may not be perfect so please be patient ;-)

Greetings,
Boi

Hi Boi,

Currently is not possible since the displayname isn't a DependencyProperty, the only way without chaging the mui code is to do it in the code behind.
see https://mui.codeplex.com/discussions/446380

Regards
